mapper.select: select count(*) cnt from lesson where authority='Y'

select lcode, category, lname, teacher_name, status from(select lcode, category, lname, teacher_name, status, row_number() over(order by lcode desc)r_num from lesson where not status='A') where r_num between #{ startNum } and #{ endNum }

select lcode, category, lname, teacher_name, status from(select lcode, category, lname, teacher_name, status, row_number() over(order by lcode desc)r_num from lesson where not status='A' and ${option} like '%'||#{keyword}||'%') where r_num between #{ startNum } and #{ endNum }

select lcode, category, lname, teacher_name, status from(select lcode, category, lname, teacher_name, status, row_number() over(order by lcode desc)r_num from lesson where status=#{status}) where r_num between #{ startNum } and #{ endNum }
